bpp/descriptor.name: GlobalLinker Mall
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: GlobalLinker is a B2B networking and digitization enablement platform empowering micro and small businesses in creating their digital presence and growing digitally in the new normal.

Skin Type: Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin
descriptor.long_desc: Water, Niacinamide, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glycerin, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Stearic Acid, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Titanium Dioxide, Triethanolamine, Isohexadecane, Benzyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Carbomer, Dimethiconol, Methylparaben, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Features Lighten skin tone Brightens dull skin Reduce the appeara How to Use Use on a clean face and neck. Apply a small amount all over the face and neck. Massage gently until absorbed.

descriptor.name: NIVEA Soft Light Moisturizer - With Vitamin E & Jojoba Oil, For Face, Hand & Body, Instant Hydration, Non-greasy Cream (Gender - Male) by BPC Store
descriptor.short_desc: NIVEA Soft is a highly effective intensive moisturizing cream that leaves your skin feeling soft and supple.  Formulated with nourishing Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil, NIVEA Soft is soft, light and quickly absorbed to refresh and invigorate your skin. It is suitable for all skins types, dermatologically approved and can be used on the face, body and hands.  When you think of body care products, you may come up with lotions or other moisturizers. But the meaning of body care of far more extensive – simply put, it refers to everything that delivers care for you, from head to toe. This includes body cleanser, deodorant, face care and hand care products, plus so much more. And this is where NIVEA’s expertise lies: in developing exceptional formulas made from the most effective and highest quality active ingredients to deliver the results you require, wherever you need the care
descriptor.long_desc: Whether you want to reduce wrinkles around your eyes, smooth rough hands or comfortably shave your legs, NIVEA has an answer to your need with a body care product within a wide-ranging portfolio. Because when your body feels well cared for, you’ll feel better in everything else that you do.  NIVEA, a hundred years of skincare for life! Composition Water, Myristyl Alcohol, Mineral Oil, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat., Stearic Acid, Petrolatum, Myristyl Myristate, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Dimethicone, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil (Jojoba), Tocopheryl Acetate, Polyglyceryl 2 Caprate, Phenoxyethanol, Lanolin Alcohol, Fragrance, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Cetyl Phosphate, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Propylparaben, Butylparaben, Isobutylparaben. Features   ENRICHED WITH: Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil to keep skin moisturized every day   FOR DAILY USE: nourishing and intensive moisturizing formula ideal to be used all over the face, hands and body How to Us

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.common_or_generic_name_of_commodity: NIVEA Soft Light Moisturizer - With Vitamin E & Jojoba Oil, For Face, Hand & Body, Instant Hydration, Non-greasy Cream

descriptor.name: Clean & Clear Foaming Face Wash (Gender - Female) by BPC Store
descriptor.short_desc: Clean & Clear Foaming face wash is specially designed to cleanse thoroughly and remove excess oil. it helps to remove oil & 99.8% pimple-causing germs, removes oil & dirt without causing dryness. it helps prevent pimples & blackheads. it is suitable for normal to oily skin. this face wash is suitable for both men and women.
descriptor.long_desc: Composition Water, Triethanolamine, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid, Glycerin, Lauryl Phosphate, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Methylparaben, BHT, Propylparaben, O-cymene-5-Ol, Ethylparaben, Benzophenone-4. How to Use Step 1: Apply a small amount on wet palm and work into a rich lather. Step 2: Gently massage onto face, avoiding the eye area. Step 3: Rinse off thoroughly.

descriptor.name: Olay Total Effects 7 In 1 Day Cream - Normal, SPF 15, Rich In Vitamin, Mini (Gender - Female) by BPC Store
descriptor.short_desc: International bestseller Skincare Brand Olay has engineered a range of products that promises the perfect skin for all ages and across skin types. Olay Total Effects delivers optimal hydration to nourish skin ?and visibly fight the 7 signs of aging (Smoothes, Evens Tone, Brightens, Refines Pores, Reduces Age Spots, Restores ? Firmness, Moisturises)?. Vitamin B5 is an anti-inflammitory and skin conditioner, boosts collagen and treats acne. Vitamin B3 renews your cell and holds skin moisture. Anti-oxidants Vitamin C, Vitamin E and Green Tea clears skin, prevents aging and protects from harmful radicals of the environment. Visible Skin Results from Day 1. Start with the youthful glow for your skin, now with Total Effects Moisturiser.
descriptor.long_desc: Composition Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Isohexadecane, Dimethicone, Isopropyl Isostearate, Polyacrylamide, Stearyl Alcohol, Sucrose Plycottonseedate, Cetyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Behenyl Alcohol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Titanium Dioxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Coconut Oil, Dimethiconol, Laureth-7, Fragrance, Ethylparaben, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol, Peg- 100 Stearate, Stearic Acid, Disodium Edta, Propylparaben, Hydrolized Wheat Protein, Sodium Hydroxide, Methylparaben & Ammonium Polyacrylate Features Firms skin and provides 7 anti-ageing benefits in 1 product all while you sleep. Moisturises to firm the appearance of skin while you sleep. Fights 7 signs of ageing. How to Use Smooth on clean face and neck every night before sleep. Massage the fast-absorbing cream into the skin on the face and neck. Gentle enough for everyday use.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.common_or_generic_name_of_commodity: Olay Total Effects 7 In 1 Day Cream - Normal, SPF 15, Rich In Vitamin, Mini
